entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Net.Http.Functional - NativeAOT timeouts #75493
  • Hot reloading a change in Blazor WebAssembly app after hitting a breakpoint causes browser to crash #75492
    7.0.0
  • Reflection-free Native AOT and Enum.IsDefined #75487
  • System.Net.Security crash on arm64-Mono #75484
  • HttpClient crashes app with no error #75483
  • TarWriter uses ASCII to write down fields and should use UTF8 instead #75482
    7.0.0
  • Annotate remaining runtime libraries for NativeAOT #75480
    8.0.0
  • Why is `System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata.Id` a `long`? #75476
  • [wasm-mt] AOT compilation with threading enabled results in out of bounds memory access #75474
    7.0.0
  • Quic tests timing out on Linux arm32 #75471
  • Explore ways to reduce Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler size #75468
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: WasmTestOnBrowser-System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles - Memory access out of bounds #75465
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.HashAlgorithmTest.ComputeHashAsync_SupportsCancellation - no exception #75463
  • [release/7.0][wasm] V8 segfault on perf pipeline #75459
  • Consolidate System.Private.Xml tests into a single csproj #75456
    8.0.0
  • SqlServer.Types regressed on .NET 7 #75455
  • JIT: Bad codegen with loop #75442
    8.0.0
  • Performance regression when deserializing compressed binary XML streams using data contract serializers #75437
  • HttpClientHandler always set LocalCertificateSelectionCallback delegate in SslOptions #75434
  • [API Proposal]: Random.Next<T> #75431
    8.0.0

Closed

  • CI failure: `Installer-coreclr-Linux_x64-Release` `Microsoft.NET.HostModel.ComHost.Tests`- Constructor parameters did not have matching fixture data: SharedTestState fixture #75491
  • Get,Post,Put methods...... #75446
  • Prefer32Bit flag produces invalid output assembly in .NET 7 #70776
    7.0.0
  • FileNotFoundException for Microsoft.SqlServer.Types 10.0.0.0 when trying to use SQL Server geography data #75481
    Future
  • Feature proposal: remove implicit construction of DateTimeOffset from DateTime #32954
    Future
  • System.Net.* and System.Security.* crash on NativeAOT arm64 #74710
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.DotNet.CoreSetup.Test.HostActivation tests failing in CI #75429
  • ConfigurationReloadToken does not suppress ExecutionContext capture #36507
    Future
  • JIT: Redundant fmov's on arm64 for a simple function #58954
    Future
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_16833/Test16833/Test16833.sh #66568
    7.0.0
  • [mono] iOS HelloWorld sample build configuration does not use same size optimizations as MAUI #75337
    8.0.0
  • Enhance Console.ReadLine() to return at Tab #800
    Future
  • [wasm] `System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.Tests` failing with `memory access out of bounds` #75430
  • Error hot reloading new method in Blazor WebAssembly app #75324
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests crash on OSX Mono #75307
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Benchstones\\BenchI\\Fib\\Fib\\Fib.cmd #75325
  • [wasm-mt] Add a System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.BrowserSynchronizationContext #69409
    Future
  • Memory leaking with Serializing JSON on Large Objects #75314
  • [WASM] Anonymous pipes issue #75394
  • [Mono] Behavior difference between optimized and non-optimized build #75125
    8.0.0
  • Can we make HttpClientFactory as purely configuration API? #74508
  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException message is incorrect when inserting into a list #1250
    Future
  • JsonSerializer.Serialize does not serialize properties as interface data type #75402
  • [mono] Optimize box+callvirt to direct call #32166
    8.0.0
  • JIT: check/release diff in arm SPMI libraries_tests.pmi #75221
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluate expression on VS #75495
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluate expression on VS #75494
    area-Build-mono
  • Reverting change in source generators that require Roslyn 4.4 until we have a VS version with the compiler fix to consume them. #75490
  • JIT: fix SPMI collection for getStaticFieldCurrentClass #75489
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • load quic early to prevent interaction with tests #75488
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, test-enhancement
  • [release/7.0] Port workload fixes from 6.0 #75486
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add well-known OIDs to System.Formats.Asn1 #75485
    tenet-performance, area-System.Formats.Asn1, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] udpate MsQuic to 2.1.1 #75479
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • Minor fixes to write barriers #75478
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump emscripten dep to use new manifest #75477
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • fix exclusions. #75475
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use AzDO Pipeline Resources to define our build Docker containers #75473
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix reference to `Microsoft.Build.NoTargets` #75472
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Simplify and fix the Int128 *, /, and % logic #75470
    area-System.Numerics
  • [Mono]: Add PLT entry index validation mode for MONO_ARCH_CODE_EXEC_ONLY. #75464
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [main] Pass resource items for VS generated authoring #75462
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/7.0] Pass resource items for VS generated authoring #75461
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [WIP][mono][tests] Testing disabled library tests on ARMv6 architecture #75458
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection-mono
  • [Android] Update DateTimeOffset.Now fast path routine #75457
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • [release/6.0] Pass resource items for VS generated authoring #75454
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Replace net7 with net8 in dogfooding and workflow docs #75453
    area-Meta
  • Remove most of string.Trim() usages in System.Private.Xml solution. #75452
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Do not maintain `GTF_VAR_MULTIREG` before lowering #75449
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] enable issue 58812 #75444
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 ConvertToInt32 intrinsics for Amd64 #75443
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Don't unload MsQuic from the process #75441
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Revert "[mono][llvm] Disable simd intrinsics when we might be interop… #75438
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Implements eager finalization of weak references #75436
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • set session ID when TLS resume is enabled #75435
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.0
  • JIT: fix incorrect scale in genCreateAddrMode + no-opt #75433
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [release/7.0] load msquic early to avoid interference with RemoteExecutor #75466
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix macOS floating point corruption #75467
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0][mono] Fix assertion while adding a new method using Hot Reload #75460
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Manually backporting #74599 to 7.0 for RC2. #75366
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • [Perf] Update shared/Microsoft.NETCore.App path from 7.0.0 to 8.0.0 path for main runs. #75285
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • update helix queues to pick up MsQuic 2.1.1 #75380
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Replace marshalled delegate in X509Certificate verification #75401
    area-System.Security
  • Make RegisterChangeCallback consistent with CancellationChangeToken and ConfigurationReloadToken #75158
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Allow substituting SIMD calls into HWIs #75448
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make forward sub a little bit more precise in GLOB_REF tagging #75404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • remove Centos 8 from Helix as it is EOL #75299
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • use Task.Run to execute SmtpClient #74910
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Arm64: Skip redundant hwintrinsic float movs (#58954) #75202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix broken `dotnet-runtime-perf` #75408
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Fix macOS floating point corruption #75440
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix test issues on armv6, ppc64le on runtime-community #75367
    area-Meta, arch-s390x, arch-ppc64le
  • Including ILStrip build task when building iOS sample app in fullAOT mode #75339
    area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [wasm] Add common vector min/max implementation #75451
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • load msquic early to avoid interference with RemoteExecutor #75424
    test-enhancement, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Target only net7.0 during source-build #75168
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update APICompat and compatibility suppression files #75447
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Add RIDs for macOS 13 #75428
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Do not emit mangled names in mstat files #75407
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Flush instruction cache after thunk pool allocation #75403
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable on Windows (#75176) #75377
    area-System.Transactions
  • [release/7.0][wasm][host] Track change in forwardConsole parameter to forwardConso… #75372
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Bump the NoTargets version #75397
  • [mono] Fix assertion while adding a new method using Hot Reload. #75432
    area-EnC-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix WebSockets.Client.ConnectTest crash for apple mobile platforms #75423
    area-System.Net, test-bug, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Additional build fixes #75297
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Use newer helix images with updated v8 #75271
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [Android][libs] Introduce DateTimeOffset.Now temporary fast result #74965
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Unit test running two instances of .NET #75181
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Delete a few dead NetworkInformation helpers #74976
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] add git hash to dotnet.js and print it from unit tests #75279
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Quiet NaNs on x86 hosts #75338
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix IPv6 detection in QUIC tests #75382
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Add RIDs for macOS 13 #75371
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution

Updated

  • Avoid unnecessary overflow check during div/mod on Arm64 (#46010) #75272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix running WebAssembly Browser App from VS #75384
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions and block ARM #74570
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • Supply official build id to inner-source build command #75293
  • AOT ILC using a LKG bits #74435
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix prefix writing on TarHeaderWrite #75373
    area-System.IO
  • Try moving mobile tests into their own pipelines. #75213
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Bump the macOS image to one that isn't EOL yet #75294
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change VerifyXmlResolver to use TcpListener over HttpListener #75369
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Add CentOS Stream 9 to the helix matrix #74839
    community-contribution
  • [iOS] Test against iOS 16 beta #74809
    NO-MERGE
  • [wasm-mt] Disable and fix remaining failing tests on Browser with multi-threading and perf tracing enabled #75286
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Only widen short local stores #74685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete some unnecessary code #74527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: run local struct to field update in morph both pre and post order for returns #75304
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test]Disable failing iossimulator tests #74889
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline errors #75406
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Add guard word before local var CMiniColDef[9] #73736
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fixing PhysicalFilesWatcher path maintenance (Issue #71386) #72041
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix spilling of `MUL_LONG` on x86 and multi-reg HWIs #73079
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Some SIMD-related cleanup #73819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add QuicError.AlpnInUse member #74754
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Fix converting old SIMD ctors to HWI ones #71865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JitDisasm cosmetic improvements #75425
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #75311
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Fix json Serializer (all Proprties should be used) #73121
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Resolve tvOS/iOS FileSystem test failures #74927
    area-System.IO
  • Add char[] buffer to XmlRawWriter. #75411
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 AndNot intrinsic for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Modify XmlSerializators to use typed XmlWriter.WriteValue method #75415
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via crossgen2 #75230
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Initialization failures logging #75097
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Optimize the performance of InternalConfigurationRootExtensions.GetChildrenImplementation #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • R2R fixes for [Equality]Comparer.Default in jit #75422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
